definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: HF radar backscatter from the ocean surface shows nonlinearities and time variation of its spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 高频波段海洋回波信号表现了非线性和频谱时变性。

sentences.english: The performance of the adaptive algorithm can directly affect the effect of the echo canceller.
sentences.chinese: 自适应算法的性能直接影响着回波消除器的效果。

sentences.english: Phase coded signal and the pulse radar echo have been simulated.
sentences.chinese: 文中以脉冲雷达回波信号和相位码信号为例。

sentences.english: The Parktronic system operates on the echo-sounder principle.
sentences.chinese: 驻车定位系统根据回波发声器原理工作。

sentences.english: ECH(Echo Canceller Hybrid System) is used to remove sidetones.
sentences.chinese: 消除侧音采用了回波相消技术。

sentences.english: The attenuation is extracted by the spectrum of the layers at different depth.
sentences.chinese: 利用不同深度界面的回波频谱分析提取衰减系数剖面。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the return loss in air-space type fixed optical attenuator.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了空气隙型光固定衰减器的回波损耗。

sentences.english: FIG. 5 is an exemplary return-loss plot for the multi-band antenna system.
sentences.chinese: 图5是用于多波段天线系统的示例性回波损耗绘图。

sentences.english: It is important for the short-period weather prediction to transmit a radar echo image in real time.
sentences.chinese: 实时雷达回波图象的传输对短期天气予报十分重要。

sentences.english: Laser echo energy is monitored in time.
sentences.chinese: 时实输出激光回波功率。

sentences.english: The relationship between radar echo intensity and rain intensity is set up.
sentences.chinese: 建立了雷达回波强度与降水强度之间的相关关系。

sentences.english: Thus, the echo signal was the sum of reflecting signals from all scatters.
sentences.chinese: 液面回波信号即为所有散射子的散射信号之和。

sentences.english: In this article a design method of radar IF echo simulator is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种实时雷达中频回波模拟器的设计方法。

sentences.english: The Billiard-Ball Model has been used to discuss the formation of Two-photon Tri-level Echo.
sentences.chinese: 本文用弹球模型讨论了双光子三能级光子回波的形成。

sentences.english: Finally, some results of the simulation of multi-polarization raw data are given.
sentences.chinese: 并给出了一些典型的目标回波的模拟效果。

sentences.english: The director could be slewed quite quickly until the range operator picked up the target echo.
sentences.chinese: 指挥仪快速回转直到测距手捕获目标的反射回波。

definition: wake (trailing behind a ship, airplane etc)/slipstream
